title: F/S - REDUCED! - 1909 S74 White w/Backing and Colors - HOF!!!
author: old-baseball

posts.post_title: F/S - REDUCED! - 1909 S74 White w/Backing and Colors - HOF!!!
posts.post_content:
For sale is the following group of S74 silks including both white with backing and colors.  rds from the 1922 American Caramel E120 set. 

Actual USPS postage plus insurance will be added to the prices as shown. Mailed payment (check or money order) is preferred but I will accept PayPal F/F also. Please reserve at [url]old-baseball@sbcglobal.net[/url].

Bresnahan (White - Turkey Red) - $175
Chance (White - Old Mill) - $120
Mattern (White - Old Mill) - $80
McGraw (White - Turkey Red) - $250 - SOLD
Miller (White - Old Mill) - $90 - SOLD
Bresnahan (Yellow - Old Mill) - $180
Chase (Salmon - Old Mill) - $165 - SOLD
Clarke (Yellow - Old Mill) - $180
Hauser (Blue - Turkey Red) - $80
Huggins (Pink - Turkey Red) - $170 - SOLD
Mitchell (Gold - Turkey Red) - $85
